title: [Epidemiology] Over 75% of the population in Manaus, the capital of the Brazilian state of Amazonas, has already been infected with the new Coronavirus between March and October. However, this has not been enough to stop the epidemic from spreading. Researchers estimate 90% infection rate is needed for it to end.
[Epidemiology] Epidemiology of COVID-19 infection in young children under five years: A systematic review and meta-analysis
